node.statement: PART (a) â€” BIJECTIVITY. Since sigma : {1,...,n} -> {1,...,n} is injective (node 1.6.2) and both sets have cardinality n, sigma is a bijection. By identical reasoning applied to omega_2 and G_q, tau : {1,...,n} -> {1,...,n} is also a bijection. This completes the proof of part (a).
